summary: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.
cast: Tôru Emori|Aya Okamoto|Yoshiaki Umegaki|Shôzô Îzuka|Seizô Katô|Hiroya Ishimaru|Ryûji Saikachi|Yûsaku Yara|Kyôko Terase|Mamiko Noto|Akio Ôtsuka|Rikiya Koyama|Satomi Kôrogi|Mitsuru Ogata|Chiyako Shibahara|Kazuaki Ito|Atsuko Yuya|Jin Horikawa|Masao Harada|Yoshinori Sonobe|Mitsuru Sugita|Ryô Takahashi|Ryo Takahashi|Syuho Miki|Jon Avner|Shakina Nayfack|Victoria Grace|Jamieson Price|Kate Bornstein|Kirk Thornton|David Manis|Crispin Freeman|Larissa Gallagher|Erica Schroeder|Michael Sinterniklaas|Orlando Rios|Gloria Garayua|Jordan Cole|Lexie Foley|Philece Sampler|Marc Thompson|Jaden Waldman|Myrta Dangelo|Inuko Inuyama|Candice Moore|Darren Pleavin|Luis Sartor|Russell Wait
title: Tokyo Godfathers
